actions.text: Amendment (A019) offered by Ms. Wasserman Schultz.
On agreeing to the Wasserman Schultz amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment allows the Attorney General to make grants to jurisdictions for the purpose of establishing, enhancing, or operating effective civil commitment programs for sexually dangerous persons.
purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to determine if civil confinement would, through psychological evaluation, encompass those who are deemed too dangerous to return to society without proper treatment and rehabilitation.
